text:
="preserve">Central India is an Indian region.
Central India consists of two Indian states: Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh. It shares a border with Rajasthan, Gujarat, Odisha, Jharkhand, Uttar Pradesh, Maharashtra and Telangana.One of the states i.e.Chattisgarh is ruled by the Congress with Chief Minister Bhupesh Baghel.
[https://drive.google.com/file/d/12uUA8_9ZL64xbkYNDSrMhBHqUCfCPywn/view?usp=drivesdk This map of India] (press to open) shows all central Indian states in the color pink. The larger one is Madhya Pradesh while the smaller one is Chhattisgarh.
